meta.description: Optimize the production of chocolate and vanilla ice cream to maximize profit under time and worker constraints.

params.name: production_time
params.description: Time in hours required to produce one gallon of each type of ice cream.

params.name: profit_per_gallon
params.description: Profit per gallon for each type of ice cream.

params.name: workers_required
params.description: Number of workers required to produce one gallon of each type of ice cream.

vars.name: gallons
vars.description: Number of gallons to produce for each type of ice cream.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit_per_gallon[i] * gallons[i] for i in ICE_CREAM_TYPES)
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling ice cream.

constraints.name: min_chocolate_production
constraints.description: At least 5 gallons of chocolate ice cream must be produced.

constraints.name: max_chocolate_production
constraints.description: At most 10 gallons of chocolate ice cream can be produced.

constraints.name: min_vanilla_production
constraints.description: At least 5 gallons of vanilla ice cream must be produced.

constraints.name: max_vanilla_production
constraints.description: At most 8 gallons of vanilla ice cream can be produced.

constraints.name: total_production_time
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(production_time[i] * gallons[i] for i in ICE_CREAM_TYPES)
constraints.description: Total production time cannot exceed 30 hours.

constraints.name: min_workers
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(workers_required[i] * gallons[i] for i in ICE_CREAM_TYPES)
constraints.description: At least 6 workers are needed in total.
